entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow or ice pellets near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
